title: Sonnet 60 - which best describes the structure

content.question: Which of the following best describes the structure of the poem as a whole?

choices.label: Three increasingly ominous representations of a process, followed by an optimistic assertion
An extended comparison, in which two concepts are eventually shown to be at odds
A dispassionate analysis of an event, devoid of personal reference until the final image
Three different conceits about the power of an idea, followed by a generalization about its ultimate fragility

content.answer: Three increasingly ominous representations of a process, followed by an optimistic assertion

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
